remarks: The absolute value of a negative is the same as that of the positive. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 8-Sep-2014.)
statement:
abv0.a $e |- A = ( AbsVal ` R ) $.
abvneg.b $e |- B = ( Base ` R ) $.
abvneg.p $e |- N = ( invg ` R ) $.
abvneg $p |- ( ( F e. A /\ X e. B ) -> ( F ` ( N ` X ) ) = ( F ` X ) ) $.
